entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
